100 ifa=0thena=1:load"dos 5.1",8,1
110 readad:ifad=-2then180
120 ck=0:fl=peek(64)*256+peek(63)
130 readdt:ifdt=-1then150
140 pokead,dt:ck=ck+dt:ad=ad+1:goto130
150 ll=peek(64)*256+peek(63)
160 readcs:ifcs<>ckthenprint"error in data: lines";fl;"-";ll:stop
170 goto110
180 print"{clr}enhancements added":print"{2 down}pO43,0:pO44,204:pO45,0:pO46,208"
190 print"{2 down}save"+chr$(34)+"dos 5.1e"+chr$(34)+",8":print"{home}":end
